name: Eco-adventure: Can Gio mangrove forest experience by speedboat
description:
An eco-adventure to the mangrove forests of Can Gio, journeys through scenic canals, briefly entering the Mekong Delta at a local riverside market where you can absorb all the colors, sounds and aromas of this fertile region. 
Once we leave the leafy palms behind be enveloped in a dusky twilight world. Spot monkeys and gibbons swinging through the trees at Vam Sat. Feed the crocodiles at the crocodile reserve and paddle around the still waters of the bat lagoon in a small wooden boat. See villagers hand-knotting nets before spreading them out to dry in the sun at a local fishing hamlet. 
A breakfast of pastries, fresh fruits andVietnamese coffee will be served as we depart Saigon, and Vietnamese specialties on-board for lunch.
